      • offset

        long offset(S source,
            long index)
        Convert index in the source domain to Access offset.
        Parameters:
        source - the source
        index - index in the source type domain
        Returns:
        offset for Access, corresponding to the given index

      • size

        default long size(long size)
        Convert size (length) in the source domain to size in bytes.

        The default implementation returns the given size back, i. e. assuming byte-indexed source.

        Parameters:
        size - size (length) in the source type domain
        Returns:
        number of bytes, corresponding to the given size in the source type domain
